citations.narrative:
The ground in five outdoor enclosures, housing a total of 18 adult dogs, was wet over the entire surface. The enclosures
had some gravel in them but not enough to cover the ground and allow drainage of the water from the rain the previous
day. All of the dogs were wet and dirty from walking on the wet ground. Wet and dirty dogs can be uncomfortable and
may have difficulty staying warm. The licensee must ensure that enclosures are constructed and maintained to allow
adequate drainage and to keep the dogs clean and dry.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(v)  Repeat
   
Primary enclosures. 
The ground in five outdoor enclosures, housing a total of 18 adult dogs, was wet over the entire surface. The enclosures 
had some gravel in them but not enough to cover the ground and allow drainage of the water from the rain the previous 
day. All of the dogs were wet and dirty from walking on the wet ground. Wet and dirty dogs can be uncomfortable and 
may have difficulty staying warm. The licensee must ensure that enclosures are constructed and maintained to allow 
adequate drainage and to keep the dogs clean and dry. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
